title: Can't login or create account with keycard account after logout if push notifications are enabled
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem
At attempt to login with keycard after logout with enabled push notifications can't proceed - card is not recognized.

#### Expected behavior
can login;
if on this step try to create new account using "Generate new key" > keycard, the same issue will appear

#### Actual behavior
https://drive.google.com/open?id=17ZveIvJVq3Ya9aYpARPqNLL_J9RciTtC

### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Create account with keycard 
- Enable push notifications in Profile
- Restart the app (login screen will not be appeared, because status is always active)
- Go to profile -> log out
- Try to login

### Additional Information

- Status version: release 1.4.
[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
- Operating System: Android

#### Logs

